description: This Python source file defines the ScrapeGraphTools class, which provides methods for web scraping, markdown conversion, website crawling, and search scraping using an external Client. It manages different scraping tools based on initialization parameters and handles external dependencies and logging.

classes.name: ScrapeGraphTools
classes.description: A class that provides various web scraping and data extraction methods utilizing an external Client, with configurable options for different scraping modes.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the ScrapeGraphTools with optional parameters to enable different scraping functionalities and sets up the external Client.

methods.name: smartscraper
methods.description: Uses the external client to extract structured data from a webpage based on a natural language prompt.

methods.name: markdownify
methods.description: Converts a webpage to markdown format using the external client.

methods.name: crawl
methods.description: Crawls a website starting from a URL, extracting structured data based on a schema, with options for depth, page limit, and domain restriction.

methods.name: searchscraper
methods.description: Performs a search and extracts information from a webpage using the external client based on a prompt.
